article_title: 5 risk factors that threaten your health benefit investment
article_text:
Photo: AP

The average lifetime expenditure for health care is currently $316,000. Much of the cost is clearly linked to health habits.

Poor health habits are strongly associated with illness and are strong predictors of future health care costs.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Paul Mulhausen M.D.
article_metadata.description: Poor health habits are strong predictors of future health care costs. Your organization can do something about this--starting with identifying 5 metabolic risk factors employees might have and then working to create a culture of health.
